name: Standing
text:
§605-15.1  Standing.  The attorney general or any bar association in this State may maintain an action for violations of section 605-14. [L 1975, c 45, pt of §2]
 
Case Notes
 
  Only bar association or attorney general has standing to bring action for violation of §605-14.  501 F. Supp. 830 (1980).
